```
[donnie@fedora ~]$ env
SHELL=/bin/bash
IMSETTINGS_INTEGRATE_DESKTOP=yes
COLORTERM=truecolor
XDG_CONFIG_DIRS=/etc/xdg/lxsession:/etc/xdg
HISTCONTROL=ignoredups
. . .
. . .
MAIL=/var/spool/mail/donnie
OLDPWD=/etc/profile.d
_=/bin/env
[donnie@fedora ~]$ 
```

```
[donnie@fedora ~]$ export car=Ford
[donnie@fedora ~]$ echo $car
Ford
[donnie@fedora ~]$ bash
[donnie@fedora ~]$ echo $car
Ford
[donnie@fedora ~]$ exit
exit
[donnie@fedora ~]$ 
```
